name: full-stack-open-2020-part3
description: Part 3 of the full stack open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open-2020/part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full-stack-open-2020-part3/build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Milan Milovanovic
